title: Validated Viral Hits
description: Per-read viral hit assignments with post-hoc BLAST validation results, as produced by the DOWNSTREAM workflow. Each row represents a single putative viral read. The `aligner_*` columns are inherited from the RUN workflow, where reads are aligned by Bowtie2 (short-read) or Minimap2 (ONT) and then processed into per-read summary statistics; LCA and score statistics are calculated post-hoc across all alignments for each read. Reference sequences are partitioned into three subsets: natural (non-artificial NCBI sequences, unsuffixed columns), artificial (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077, i.e. synthetic constructs and vectors, `_artificial` suffix), and combined (both natural and artificial, `_combined` suffix). The `prim_align_*` columns contain data extracted from the primary alignment record (not secondary or supplementary) in the aligner SAM output. Reads are clustered by species using VSEARCH, cluster representatives are BLASTed against the NCBI core_nt database, and validation results are propagated back to all reads in each cluster. Produced for both short-read and ONT platforms; paired-end-specific columns contain NA values for ONT.

fields.name: seq_id
fields.title: Sequence ID
fields.description: Unique read identifier (query name from the sequencing instrument).

fields.name: sample
fields.title: Sample
fields.description: Sample identifier from the RUN workflow.

fields.name: aligner_taxid_lca
fields.title: Aligner LCA Taxon ID
fields.description: Lowest common ancestor taxon ID across all alignments for this read, calculated post-hoc from Bowtie2 (short-read) or Minimap2 (ONT) outputs, considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences.

fields.name: aligner_taxid_top
fields.title: Aligner Top Taxon ID
fields.description: Taxon ID of the highest-scoring alignment for this read from Bowtie2 (short-read) or Minimap2 (ONT), considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences.

fields.name: aligner_length_normalized_score_mean
fields.title: Aligner Length-Normalized Score (Mean)
fields.description: Mean length-normalized alignment score (alignment_score / ln(read_length)) across all alignments for this read, considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences.

fields.name: aligner_taxid_lca_combined
fields.title: Aligner LCA Taxon ID (Combined)
fields.description: Lowest common ancestor taxon ID across all alignments for this read, calculated post-hoc from aligner outputs, considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial).

fields.name: aligner_n_assignments_combined
fields.title: Aligner Assignment Count (Combined)
fields.description: Number of reference sequences that the read aligned to, considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial).

fields.name: aligner_length_normalized_score_mean_combined
fields.title: Aligner Length-Normalized Score (Combined)
fields.description: Mean length-normalized alignment score (alignment_score / ln(read_length)) across all alignments for this read, considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial).

fields.name: aligner_taxid_lca_artificial
fields.title: Aligner LCA Taxon ID (Artificial)
fields.description: Lowest common ancestor taxon ID across all alignments for this read, calculated post-hoc from aligner outputs, considering only artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077). NA when no artificial references were matched.

fields.name: aligner_n_assignments_artificial
fields.title: Aligner Assignment Count (Artificial)
fields.description: Number of artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077) that the read aligned to. 0 when no artificial references were matched.

fields.name: aligner_length_normalized_score_mean_artificial
fields.title: Aligner Length-Normalized Score (Artificial)
fields.description: Mean length-normalized alignment score (alignment_score / ln(read_length)) across all alignments for this read, considering only artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077). NA when no artificial references were matched.

fields.name: query_len
fields.title: Query Length
fields.description: Read length in bases. For paired-end data, this is the forward read length.

fields.name: query_len_rev
fields.title: Query Length (Reverse)
fields.description: Reverse read length in bases. Only present for paired-end (short-read) data; NA for ONT.

fields.name: query_seq
fields.title: Query Sequence
fields.description: Read nucleotide sequence. For paired-end data, this is the forward read sequence.

fields.name: query_seq_rev
fields.title: Query Sequence (Reverse)
fields.description: Reverse read nucleotide sequence. Only present for paired-end (short-read) data; NA for ONT.

fields.name: query_qual
fields.title: Query Quality
fields.description: Base quality scores in Phred+33 ASCII encoding. For paired-end data, this is the forward read quality.

fields.name: query_qual_rev
fields.title: Query Quality (Reverse)
fields.description: Reverse read base quality scores in Phred+33 ASCII encoding. Only present for paired-end (short-read) data; NA for ONT.

fields.name: prim_align_genome_id_all
fields.title: Primary Alignment Genome ID
fields.description: NCBI accession ID(s) of the genome(s) the read aligned to in its primary alignment. For discordant paired-end alignments where forward and reverse reads map to different genomes, IDs are joined with '/' in forward/reverse order.

fields.name: prim_align_taxid_all
fields.title: Primary Alignment Taxon ID
fields.description: NCBI taxon ID(s) corresponding to the genome(s) the read aligned to in its primary alignment. For discordant paired-end alignments where forward and reverse reads map to different genomes, IDs are joined with '/' in forward/reverse order.

fields.name: prim_align_fragment_length
fields.title: Fragment Length
fields.description: Inferred fragment length from the primary alignment (distance between outer edges of the read pair alignment). Only present for paired-end (short-read) data; NA for ONT.

fields.name: prim_align_best_alignment_score
fields.title: Best Alignment Score
fields.description: Best alignment score from the primary alignment. For paired-end data, this is the forward read score.

fields.name: prim_align_best_alignment_score_rev
fields.title: Best Alignment Score (Reverse)
fields.description: Best alignment score for the reverse read. Only present for paired-end (short-read) data; NA for ONT.

fields.name: prim_align_edit_distance
fields.title: Edit Distance
fields.description: Edit distance between the read and the aligned reference sequence in the primary alignment (SAM NM tag: mismatches plus inserted and deleted bases). For paired-end data, this is the forward read edit distance.

fields.name: prim_align_edit_distance_rev
fields.title: Edit Distance (Reverse)
fields.description: Edit distance between the reverse read and the aligned reference sequence in the primary alignment (SAM NM tag). Only present for paired-end (short-read) data; NA for ONT.

fields.name: prim_align_ref_start
fields.title: Reference Start Position
fields.description: 0-based start position of the alignment on the reference genome. For paired-end data, this is the forward read position.

fields.name: prim_align_ref_start_rev
fields.title: Reference Start Position (Reverse)
fields.description: 0-based start position of the reverse read alignment on the reference genome. Only present for paired-end (short-read) data; NA for ONT.

fields.name: prim_align_query_rc
fields.title: Query Reverse Complement
fields.description: Whether the read was reverse-complemented in the primary alignment. For paired-end data, this is the forward read flag.

fields.name: prim_align_query_rc_rev
fields.title: Query Reverse Complement (Reverse)
fields.description: Whether the reverse read was reverse-complemented in the primary alignment. Only present for paired-end (short-read) data; NA for ONT.

fields.name: prim_align_pair_status
fields.title: Pair Status
fields.description: Bowtie2 pair alignment status code. CP = concordant pair, DP = discordant pair, UP = unpaired. Only present for paired-end (short-read) data; NA for ONT.

fields.name: group
fields.title: Group
fields.description: Group identifier assigned to this set of samples.

fields.name: prim_align_dup_exemplar
fields.title: Duplicate Exemplar Read ID
fields.description: Read ID of the exemplar selected to represent this read's alignment-based duplicate group (based on alignment coordinates, not sequence similarity). A read that is its own exemplar (seq_id == prim_align_dup_exemplar) is either unique or the chosen representative of its duplicate group. Only present for short-read data; NA for ONT.

fields.name: vsearch_cluster_id
fields.title: VSEARCH Cluster ID
fields.description: Numeric identifier for the VSEARCH cluster this read was assigned to during validation clustering.

fields.name: vsearch_cluster_rep_id
fields.title: VSEARCH Cluster Representative ID
fields.description: Read ID of the cluster representative for this read's cluster. Validation results from this representative are propagated to all reads in the cluster.

fields.name: vsearch_seq_length
fields.title: VSEARCH Sequence Length
fields.description: Length of the sequence used for VSEARCH clustering. May differ from query_len if the sequence was trimmed.

fields.name: vsearch_is_cluster_rep
fields.title: Is Cluster Representative
fields.description: Whether this read is the representative of its VSEARCH cluster.

fields.name: vsearch_percent_identity
fields.title: VSEARCH Percent Identity
fields.description: Percent identity between this read's sequence and the cluster representative's sequence. 100.0 for the cluster representative itself.

fields.name: vsearch_orientation
fields.title: VSEARCH Alignment Orientation
fields.description: Orientation of the alignment to the cluster representative. '+' for same strand, '-' for reverse complement.

fields.name: vsearch_cigar
fields.title: VSEARCH CIGAR String
fields.description: CIGAR string describing the alignment of this read to the cluster representative.

fields.name: vsearch_cluster_size
fields.title: VSEARCH Cluster Size
fields.description: Number of sequences in this VSEARCH cluster.

fields.name: group_species
fields.title: Group-Species Identifier
fields.description: Composite identifier combining group and species-level taxon ID, used internally for partitioning sequences during validation (format: group_taxid).

fields.name: validation_staxid_lca_combined
fields.title: Validation LCA Taxon ID (Combined)
fields.description: LCA taxon ID from BLAST validation of the cluster representative against core_nt, considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_n_assignments_combined
fields.title: Validation Assignment Count (Combined)
fields.description: Number of BLAST assignments retained after filtering, considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation; 0 when it was BLASTed but no hits were retained.

fields.name: validation_n_assignments_classified_combined
fields.title: Validation Classified Assignment Count (Combined)
fields.description: Number of classified BLAST assignments (with known taxonomic classification), considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation; 0 when it was BLASTed but no classified hits were retained.

fields.name: validation_staxid_top_combined
fields.title: Validation Top Taxon ID (Combined)
fields.description: Taxon ID of the top-scoring BLAST hit, considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_staxid_top_classified_combined
fields.title: Validation Top Hit Classified (Combined)
fields.description: Whether the top-scoring BLAST hit has a known taxonomic classification, considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_bitscore_min_combined
fields.title: Validation Min Bitscore (Combined)
fields.description: Minimum bitscore among retained BLAST hits, considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_bitscore_max_combined
fields.title: Validation Max Bitscore (Combined)
fields.description: Maximum bitscore among retained BLAST hits, considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_bitscore_mean_combined
fields.title: Validation Mean Bitscore (Combined)
fields.description: Mean bitscore among retained BLAST hits, considering all reference sequences (both natural and artificial). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_staxid_lca
fields.title: Validation LCA Taxon ID
fields.description: LCA taxon ID from BLAST validation, considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences. NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no natural hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_n_assignments
fields.title: Validation Assignment Count
fields.description: Number of BLAST assignments retained after filtering, considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences. NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation; 0 when it was BLASTed but no natural hits were retained.

fields.name: validation_n_assignments_classified
fields.title: Validation Classified Assignment Count
fields.description: Number of classified BLAST assignments (with known taxonomic classification), considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences. NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation; 0 when it was BLASTed but no classified natural hits were retained.

fields.name: validation_staxid_top
fields.title: Validation Top Taxon ID
fields.description: Taxon ID of the top-scoring BLAST hit, considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences. NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no natural hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_staxid_top_classified
fields.title: Validation Top Hit Classified
fields.description: Whether the top-scoring BLAST hit has a known taxonomic classification, considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences. NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no natural hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_bitscore_min
fields.title: Validation Min Bitscore
fields.description: Minimum bitscore among retained BLAST hits, considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences. NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no natural hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_bitscore_max
fields.title: Validation Max Bitscore
fields.description: Maximum bitscore among retained BLAST hits, considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences. NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no natural hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_bitscore_mean
fields.title: Validation Mean Bitscore
fields.description: Mean bitscore among retained BLAST hits, considering only natural (non-artificial) reference sequences. NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no natural hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_staxid_lca_artificial
fields.title: Validation LCA Taxon ID (Artificial)
fields.description: LCA taxon ID from BLAST validation, considering only artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no artificial hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_n_assignments_artificial
fields.title: Validation Assignment Count (Artificial)
fields.description: Number of BLAST assignments retained after filtering, considering only artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation; 0 when it was BLASTed but no artificial hits were retained.

fields.name: validation_n_assignments_classified_artificial
fields.title: Validation Classified Assignment Count (Artificial)
fields.description: Number of classified BLAST assignments (with known taxonomic classification), considering only artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation; 0 when it was BLASTed but no classified artificial hits were retained.

fields.name: validation_staxid_top_artificial
fields.title: Validation Top Taxon ID (Artificial)
fields.description: Taxon ID of the top-scoring BLAST hit, considering only artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no artificial hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_staxid_top_classified_artificial
fields.title: Validation Top Hit Classified (Artificial)
fields.description: Whether the top-scoring BLAST hit has a known taxonomic classification, considering only artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no artificial hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_bitscore_min_artificial
fields.title: Validation Min Bitscore (Artificial)
fields.description: Minimum bitscore among retained BLAST hits, considering only artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no artificial hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_bitscore_max_artificial
fields.title: Validation Max Bitscore (Artificial)
fields.description: Maximum bitscore among retained BLAST hits, considering only artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no artificial hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_bitscore_mean_artificial
fields.title: Validation Mean Bitscore (Artificial)
fields.description: Mean bitscore among retained BLAST hits, considering only artificial reference sequences (descendants of NCBI taxid 81077). NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no artificial hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_distance_aligner
fields.title: Validation Distance (Aligner)
fields.description: Taxonomic distance (number of parent-child steps) from the original aligner LCA taxon ID to the LCA of both the aligner and validation assignments. NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no natural hits were retained after filtering.

fields.name: validation_distance_validation
fields.title: Validation Distance (Validation)
fields.description: Taxonomic distance (number of parent-child steps) from the validation LCA taxon ID to the LCA of both the aligner and validation assignments. NA when the cluster representative was not selected for BLAST validation, or when no natural hits were retained after filtering.
